content: Can you describe the project a bit more?

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Would you like the snake image to convey a specific theme or emotion related to the video game marketplace?", "option1": "Yes, I want it to be aligned with adventurous themes.", "option2": "No, just a generic snake image will do."}, {"question 2": "Should the snake image be a static picture or an animated graphic?", "option1": "I'd prefer a static picture.", "option2": "An animated graphic would be great."}], "input_token_count": 333, "output_token_count": 109, "time_taken": "0:00:04.448490"}
change the image to a snake

{"status": "success", "ui_elements_checklist": [{"feature": "Add a game search form with autocomplete suggestions", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Include a 'Sort By' button with options like - Price, Popularity, and Release Date", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Place an 'Add to Cart' button on each game listing", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Incorporate a 'Filter By' button with genre and platform options", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Add a 'Wishlist' button alongside each game for easy access", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Include a 'View Trailer' button on game detail pages", "checked": true}], "input_token_count": 265, "output_token_count": 150, "time_taken": "0:00:04.304227"}

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "For the new forms and buttons, do you have a specific functionality in mind that they should fulfill?", "option1": "Yes, I need them to perform specific actions.", "option2": "No, they are just for visual aesthetics at the moment."}, {"question 2": "Do you want these forms and buttons to align with the video game theme in terms of design and color scheme?", "option1": "Yes, they should match the theme exactly.", "option2": "No, they can be standard design, the theme is not necessary."}], "input_token_count": 311, "output_token_count": 127, "time_taken": "0:00:03.586707"}
Absolutely, I'll add the requested forms and buttons.
Add a few random forms and buttons to this component

{"status": "success", "ui_elements_checklist": [{"feature": "Add a dynamic background that changes based on trending video games", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Implement a dark mode feature for user eye comfort during night-time browsing", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Use parallax scrolling effect for an interactive background experience", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Incorporate a section for live wallpapers related to popular video games", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Enable users to customize the background with their favorite game art", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Offer a light mode featuring more vibrant, game-themed backgrounds for daylight visibility", "checked": false}], "input_token_count": 212, "output_token_count": 133, "time_taken": "0:00:03.574053"}

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Would you prefer a dynamic, animated background that reflects various video game genres, or a static, high-resolution image capturing a specific game's essence?", "option1": "Dynamic, animated background", "option2": "Static, high-resolution image"}, {"question 2": "Do you have any specific video games or characters in mind that you want to feature in the background, or should we select based on general popularity and relevance to your target audience?", "option1": "Yes, I have specific games/characters in mind", "option2": "Select based on popularity and relevance"}], "input_token_count": 258, "output_token_count": 133, "time_taken": "0:00:03.554944"}
Change this background to be video game themed

In the conversation, the user requested the AI assistant to change the background to a video game theme, to which the AI acknowledged and confirmed that it was working on this task. The AI then presented the user with a checklist of additional features, including adding an animation effect to a Hadoken button, customizing button color and style, adding a tooltip explaining Hadoken, creating a responsive design, and implementing a sound effect on button click. The user instructed the AI to add the Hadoken button, which the AI accepted. 

Next, the AI offered another checklist that included features like a garbage-themed text style, custom font for themed text, dynamic text color, background animation effect, and text shadow for visibility. The user requested to change the text to a garbage theme, and the AI confirmed it would do so. The AI followed this with another list that included changing the main display image to a garbage-themed graphic, adding a dropdown for favorite video game genres, implementing a rating system, including a section for user reviews, and adding a search bar. The user asked to change the picture to be garbage themed, and the AI acknowledged this request as well. Throughout the conversation, the AI presented questions to the user regarding specific preferences for the Hadoken button action, the visual styling of the button, the type of text for the garbage theme, and the type of garbage imagery for the background.
